mapper.sql: with RECURSIVE cmt_locations as ( select locat_id, locat_name, cmt_location_master.locat_type_id locat_type_id, loctt_name from cmt_location_master inner join cmt_location_type on locat_type_id = loctt_id where locat_parent_id = #{conditions.locationId.value} and locat_is_active = true union all select cm.locat_id locat_id, cm.locat_name locat_name, cm.locat_type_id locat_type_id, ct.loctt_name loctt_name from cmt_location_master cm INNER JOIN cmt_locations cl on cl.locat_id = cm.locat_parent_id inner join cmt_location_type ct on cm.locat_type_id = ct.loctt_id where locat_is_active = true) select * from cmt_locations where locat_type_id = #{conditions.locationTypeId.value}
